properties.address: 1 Lower Street, Cleobury Mortimer, Shropshire DY14 8BN
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 6th November 2023** We cater for anyone that walks through our doors! We have a free soup lunch every Monday between 12:30pm-2pm. This is available for anyone... Working from home, Who fancies soup for lunch, Who home educates, Who hasn't spoken to anyone on that day, Who needs a different environment for lunch... etc, etc.
properties.title: Cleobury Community Hub

properties.address: 24 Teme Street, Tenbury Wells, Worcestershire WR15 8AA
properties.description: Our library offers a large collection of books for adults and children, free WiFi and access to computers. We host regular activities for adults and children, many of which are free. Located in the town centre we are easily accessible by public transport. Public car parks nearby.
properties.title: Tenbury Wells Library

properties.description: The Maidenhead offers an inviting lounge & bar area with two wood burning fires, free WiFi and an offering of hot drinks, snacks and food.
properties.title: The Maidenhead, Orleton

properties.description: We have a social space in our building where you are welcome to come and sit and have a chat. The Space serves subsidised refreshments and a warm welcome.
properties.title: The Social Space

properties.description: Open every Monday from 6th. November, 11am-2pm. Offering friendship and free lunch.
properties.title: Welcome Space
